Text: Can someone who has downloaded tell me if the "Other Side of the Coin" Campaign is playable, because I downloaded another torrent that said it had OSOTC but when I went into the game the OSOTC campaign was nowhere to be seen. Please tell me and thanks.
Yes, Other Side of the Coin is palyable, but you have to go to Challenges, not Adventure, to access it.

In magicka.exe is trojan.win32.chifrax.a 
. Anyone can explain it?
Yes its trojan, i dnt know in this release realy on group THETA
game will not start, please help

@maxy999
Thanks dude, everything is working fine including OSOTC.

Doesn't work for me. Just crashes to Desktop and says, "Magicka has stopped working."
Reinstalled XNA, DirectX, already. 
Any idea why it just gives up on me?
Multiplayer is disabled on this release.

SteamServices.exe

the handle is invalid

Please help!

Install.

Microsoft .NET Compact Framework 3.5
Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 3.1 
Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 (x64) (I have win7 x64)
Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 (The bighuge 200mb version that I snagged from somewhere)

And reinstall DirectX 9.0c from any older video game disc.

That's how I got it to work. Had the same problem where the intro works, but the game autoquits.
